item.title: Knowledge Management with Obsidian
item.description: Retaining information is difficult at the best of times let alone considering what happens to us with age. I have an obscure fear of loosing my mind! As silly as that might sound there is a word for it dementophobia or the fear of madness. Perhaps because of seeing my grandmother slowly rewrite their own past before my eyes or some other as of yet unearthed psychological reason, I do find myself thinking about this very phobia and what would become.

item.title: Why should knowledge management matter?
item.description: I had already planned on making the first few posts of my blog about how I eventually set up the whole thing. This was partly because I would have something to quickly write about while it was still fresh in my mind, but also so I could stick to a habit of writing. I don’t really have a schedule in mind for how often I intend to post here (yet), but I’m hoping that with these first few technical posts I can get in the swing of it better.
